name: Character Sheet Layout
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Interface screen: Character Sheet Layout, grid-based layout with spacing, icons, meters, controls, fantasy UI (parchment/metal/wood motifs), high contrast, readable, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Typography must be crisp and readable (sans-serif, high contrast, WCAG 4.5:1). Prefer short, real labels (STR, DEX, HP, BAG, MAP) or clean unlabeled slots. Avoid nonsense strings. Ensure 8â€“24 pt equivalent sizing and consistent alignment., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
revised_prompt: Create an image in a painterly style, inspired by a tabletop fantasy game. The scene should be grounded in medieval fantasy, with culturally coherent gear and no modern technologies. Include an interface screen displaying a character sheet layout with a grid-based design, spacing, meters, controls, and fantasy-themed icons. The UI should evoke a feel of parchment, metal, and wood motifs. Aim for high contrast and readability. Incorporate elements of aquatic fantasy realism, including bioluminescent accents, and materials that suggest pressure domes. The palette should include teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearl highlights. Ensure that typography is crisp and readable, adhering to WCAG standards of 4.5:1 contrast. Abbreviations may include things like STR, DEX, HP, BAG, and MAP, or clean unlabeled slots are acceptable. No nonsense strings allowed. Keep symbols meaningful or use numbered pins. Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, and elements resembling photoreal CGI, anime style, or bloom glare.
